item.title: 俄罗斯诺瓦克称市场警惕中东冲突导致石油供应减少
item.description: 俄罗斯副总理亚历山大-诺瓦克（Alexander Novak）周三表示，油价已经上涨，因为市场不排除中东冲突导致石油供应下降的可能性。【原文：Russian Deputy Prime Minister Alexander Novak said on Wednesday that oil prices have increased as markets do not rule out a decline in oil supply due to the conflict in the Middle East.】

item.title: 加密资产管理公司 Bitwise 向证券监管机构申请 XRP ETP
item.description: 加密资产管理公司 Bitwise 已向美国证券交易委员会提交了 XRP 代币交易所交易产品的初始注册声明，在今年早些时候批准现货比特币 ETF 这一具有里程碑意义的监管决定之后，Bitwise 试图推出更多加密产品。【原文：Crypto asset manager Bitwise has filed an initial registration statement with the U.S. SEC for an exchange-traded product for XRP tokens, as it seeks to introduce more crypto products after a landmark regulatory decision to approve spot bitcoin ETF earlier this year.】

item.title: 9 月份美国 NYMEX 天然气日均期货和期权交易量上升
item.description: 纽约商品交易所（New York Mercantile Exchange）所有者 CME Group 的数据显示，9 月份该交易所的美国天然气期货和期权日均交易量（ADV）环比上升。【原文：Average daily volume (ADV) in U.S. natural gas futures and options on the New York Mercantile Exchange rose in September from a year earlier, data from its owner CME Group showed.】

item.title: 微软将在意大利投资 43 亿欧元建设人工智能基础设施和云计算能力
item.description: 微软周三在一份声明中表示，将在未来两年投资43亿欧元（47.5亿美元）加强意大利的人工智能（AI）基础设施和云计算能力。【原文：Microsoft said in a statement on Wednesday it would invest 4.3 billion euros ($4.75 billion) over the next two years to strengthen artificial intelligence (AI) infrastructure and cloud capacity in Italy.】

item.title: 塞恩斯伯里的老板期待英国预算案能缓解消费阴霾
item.description: 森斯伯瑞超市（Sainsbury's）的老板说，在工党新政府制定税收和支出计划以及利率进一步下降之前，被生活成本危机击伤的英国人将不会重新开始强劲的消费。【原文：Britons bruised by a cost of living crisis will not start spending strongly again until the new Labour government sets out its tax and spending plans, and interest rates fall further, the boss of supermarket Sainsbury's said.】

item.title: 达美航空公司与沙特航空公司签署代码共享协议以扩展网络
item.description: 达美航空公司（Delta Air Lines）周三表示，它已与沙特阿拉伯的国旗航空公司签署了代码共享协议，这将使美国与中东地区之间的联系更加紧密。【原文：Delta Air Lines said on Wednesday it has signed a codeshare agreement with the flag carrier of Saudi Arabia, which would allow greater connectivity between the United States and the Middle East.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，EQT 支持的 Zayo 和 TPG 竞购价值近 100 亿美元的皇冠城堡资产
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，光纤网络所有者 Zayo Group 和收购公司 TPG 正在竞争收购 Crown Castle 的光纤和无线资产，交易价值可能接近 100 亿美元。【原文：Fiber network owner Zayo Group and buyout firm TPG are competing to acquire the fiber and wireless assets of Crown Castle , in a deal that could be valued at nearly $10 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 福特公布第三季度美国销量疲软
item.description: 福特公司周三与汽车行业一样，报告了美国第三季度新车销售增长疲软的情况，原因是购车者继续因担心经济承受能力而不愿购买新车。【原文：Ford on Wednesday joined the automotive industry in reporting a weaker growth in third-quarter U.S. new vehicle sales, as buyers continued to shy away from purchases on affordability concerns.】

item.title: 竞争激烈导致特斯拉第三季度交付量不及预期
item.description: 受中国和欧洲竞争对手激烈竞争的影响，特斯拉周三第三季度交付量未达预期，导致这家全球最有价值汽车制造商的股价在盘前交易中下跌 3.5%。【原文：Tesla missed expectations for third-quarter deliveries on Wednesday, hurt by stiff competition from rivals in China and Europe, sending shares of the world's most valuable automaker down 3.5% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 美国将提供高达 1 亿美元的资金，促进人工智能在半导体材料中的应用
item.description: 美国商务部周三表示，计划拨款 1 亿美元用于促进人工智能在新型可持续半导体材料开发中的应用。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department said Wednesday it plans to award $100 million to boost the use of artificial intelligence in developing new sustainable semiconductor materials.】

item.title: 全球保险公司就在俄罗斯 "丢失 "的喷气机展开伦敦法庭之战
item.description: 航空租赁商的律师周三在伦敦的一次庭审上表示，自两年前乌克兰入侵以来，保险公司正在玩 "传递责任包裹 "的游戏，拼命应对因飞机滞留俄罗斯而产生的数十亿美元索赔。【原文：Insurers are playing "pass the liability parcel" in a desperate fight against multi-billion dollar claims over aircraft stranded in Russia since the invasion of Ukraine two years ago, lawyers for aviation lessors told a London trial on Wednesday.】

item.title: 通用汽车寻求在投资者日缓解股东的紧张情绪
item.description: 据两位熟悉该计划的人士透露，通用汽车公司将于下周二向投资者保证，不必对电动汽车需求减速感到恐慌，这家美国汽车制造商甚至有可能在2025年提高利润。【原文：General Motors will assure investors next Tuesday that there is no need to panic about decelerating demand for electric vehicles and the U.S. automaker could even improve its profits in 2025, according to two people familiar with the plans.】

item.title: 尽管不确定性增加，美元仍将保持坚挺：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社调查的外汇策略师的预测中值显示，尽管美联储预计将进行一系列降息，但美元在未来几个月将保持稳定。【原文：The U.S. dollar will hold steady in coming months despite an expected series of Federal Reserve interest rate cuts, according to median forecasts from FX strategists polled by Reuters who were, however, largely split on the currency's broad direction.】

item.title: 尼古拉向经销商交付的氢动力卡车第三季度增长 22
item.description: 尼古拉公司周三表示，该公司在第三季度向经销商交付了 88 辆氢燃料电池电动卡车，高于前三个月的 72 辆，这表明市场对该公司大型钻机的需求稳定。【原文：Nikola said on Wednesday it delivered 88 hydrogen fuel cell electric trucks to its dealers in the third quarter, up from 72 trucks in the previous three-month period, signaling steady demand for the company's big rigs.】

item.title: 美国 9 月私营部门就业人数好于预期
item.description: 9 月份美国私营企业薪资增幅超过预期，进一步证明劳动力市场状况并未恶化。【原文：U.S. private payrolls increased more than expected in September, further evidence that labor market conditions were not deteriorating.】

item.title: 消息人士称，欧盟的支持足以对中国电动汽车征收关税
item.description: 官员和消息人士称，法国、希腊、意大利和波兰将于周五投票赞成对进口中国制造的电动汽车（EV）征收高达 45% 的关税，这足以使欧盟的提案获得通过，此举可能会加剧与中国政府的贸易紧张关系。【原文：France, Greece, Italy and Poland will vote on Friday for tariffs of up to 45% on imports of electric vehicles (EVs) made in China, officials and sources said, enough to get the European Union proposal passed in a move likely to increase trade tensions with Beijing.】

item.title: SoFi 首次为公司提供平台，扩大 IPO 准入范围
item.description: 加州金融科技巨头SoFi公司告诉路透社，该公司正与英国资本市场平台PrimaryBid Technologies合作，拓展其首次公开募股配售业务。【原文：California fintech giant SoFi is teaming up with British capital markets platform PrimaryBid Technologies to expand its initial public offering share placement business, the company told Reuters.】

item.title: OpenAI 与意大利国家贷款机构 CDP 合作，促进人工智能在初创企业中的应用
item.description: OpenAI 与意大利国家贷款机构 CDP 签署了一份谅解备忘录，以支持意大利初创企业和创新公司采用人工智能（AI）。【原文：OpenAI and Italy's state lender CDP have signed a memorandum of understanding to support the take up of artificial intelligence (AI) by Italian startups and innovative firms.】

item.title: 中东危机引发供应担忧，美国能源公司股价上涨
item.description: 由于担心中东紧张局势升级可能威胁供应，油价上涨推动美国能源公司股价周三盘前攀升。【原文：U.S. energy companies' shares climbed premarket on Wednesday, propelled by gains in oil prices on concerns that an escalation of tensions in the Middle East could threaten supplies.】

item.title: 英国央行调查发现，金融企业对全球经济更加担忧
item.description: 英国央行（BOE）周三的一项调查显示，对全球经济衰退给英国金融体系带来风险的担忧急剧上升至2019年下半年以来的最高水平。【原文：Worries about risks to the UK financial system posed by a global economic downturn have risen sharply to their highest level since the second half of 2019, a Bank of England (BOE) survey showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 礼来公司将投资 45 亿美元在印第安纳州新建工厂
item.description: 美国制药商礼来公司（Eli Lilly）周三表示，将投资 45 亿美元在印第安纳州新建一个先进制造和药物研发中心。【原文：U.S. drugmaker Eli Lilly said on Wednesday it will invest $4.5 billion to create a new center for advanced manufacturing and drug development in Indiana.】

item.title: 需求疲软导致康奈格拉品牌公司第一季度销售额不佳
item.description: 康奈格拉品牌公司（Conagra Brands）周三公布的第一季度销售额不及分析师预期，原因是预算意识较强的消费者在购物时优先考虑价格较低的替代品，而不是该公司价格较高的主食。【原文：Conagra Brands reported first-quarter sales on Wednesday that missed analysts' estimates as budget-conscious consumers prioritized shopping for lower-priced alternatives over the company's higher-priced pantry staples.】

item.title: Humana 称其评价较高的医疗保险优势计划的会员人数在 2025 年有所下降
item.description: Humana公司称，2025年该公司为65岁及以上老年人提供的、评价很高的医疗保险优势计划（Medicare Advantage）的注册会员总数有所减少，这使得该保险公司的股价在盘前交易中下跌了约12%。【原文：Humana said the total members enrolled in its highly rated Medicare Advantage plans for people aged 65 years and above have reduced for 2025, sending the insurer's shares down about 12% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 美国基金协会选出新一届董事会，高税收和新法规风险迫在眉睫
item.description: 另类资产管理行业组织 "管理基金协会"（Managed Funds Association）周三宣布了新一届董事会成员名单，以及该协会主席、市值 160 亿美元的信贷投资公司 AB CarVal 的执行总裁乔迪-冈德森（Jody Gunderson），该行业正准备应对高税收和新监管的威胁。【原文：The Managed Funds Association, an alternative asset management trade group, announced on Wednesday its new board of directors, as well as its chair Jody Gunderson, managing principal at $16 billion credit investment firm AB CarVal, as the industry prepares for the threat of higher taxes and new regulation.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会委员称，美国海鲜餐馆因谎称本地捕捞的食品而受到警告
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会的一位官员周三表示，美国主要的海鲜餐饮连锁店已受到警告，该机构将严厉打击谎称本地捕捞的行为，此前国内渔业曾投诉菜单和广告存在误导。【原文：A U.S. Federal Trade Commission official said on Wednesday that the country's leading seafood restaurant chains have been warned that the agency will crack down on false claims of locally caught fare, following complaints from the domestic fishing industry of misleading menus and advertising.】

item.title: 耐克股价下跌，原因是预测撤销令投资者担心扭亏为盈的时间表
item.description: 耐克股价在周三的盘前交易中下跌了约 6%，此前该公司撤回了年度营收目标，这让投资者对这家运动服装巨头在新任首席执行官埃利奥特-希尔（Elliott Hill）领导下实现扭亏为盈的时间表充满了猜测。【原文：Nike shares dropped about 6% in premarket trading on Wednesday after the company withdrew its annual revenue target, keeping investors guessing on the timeline for a turnaround at the sportswear giant under incoming CEO Elliott Hill.】

item.title: 欧佩克+将在小组会议上维持产量政策不变
item.description: 两位消息人士告诉路透社，定于周三召开的欧佩克+部长级小组会议不太可能建议对政策进行任何修改，从而允许该集团从12月开始逐步增产。【原文：An OPEC+ ministerial panel scheduled to meet on Wednesday is unlikely to recommend any changes to policy, allowing the group to start gradually increasing production from December, two sources from told Reuters.】

item.title: 受美联储降息和人工智能乐观情绪影响，9 月科技市场价值飙升
item.description: 美联储降息通常会提高高增长公司的未来利润和现金流，受此提振，许多科技公司的市值在 9 月份飙升，对人工智能的持续热情也进一步推动了市值的增长。【原文：The market capitalization of many tech firms surged in September, buoyed by a Federal Reserve rate cut that typically enhances future profits and cash flows for high-growth companies, and further fuelled by continued enthusiasm for artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 时装设计师 Hedi Slimane 离开 LVMH 旗下的 Celine
item.description: 时装设计师 Hedi Slimane 已离开 LVMH 旗下的 Celine 品牌。【原文：Fashion designer Hedi Slimane has left LVMH's Celine brand, the company said on Wednesday, marking the latest high-profile departure from a fashion label as the industry grapples with a sales downturn.】

item.title: 中东紧张局势加剧，期货下跌；就业数据即将公布
item.description: 美国股指期货周三下滑，原因是中东地缘政治紧张局势和国内港口罢工事件使投资者在预计将揭示经济健康状况和货币政策轨迹的数据公布前保持紧张。【原文：U.S. stock index futures slipped on Wednesday as geopolitical tensions in the Middle East and a domestic port strike kept investors on edge ahead of data expected to shed light on the health of the economy and the monetary policy trajectory.】
